page: MI60036: Fluid Power In Mining Machinery

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic concepts, compression processes, Compressor types, inter-coolers, aftercoolers and receivers, valves, transmission of compressed air through pipeline Fundamentals of hydraulic transmission, hydraulic fluids, hydraulic pumpsfixed and variable displacement types, pressure, flow and direction control devices, hydraulic power cylinders and motors, hydraulic servo systems, hydraulic circuits and their applications in excavation and heavy earth moving machinery.
page: MI60036: Fluid Power In Mining Machinery
